messages: 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:43): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: what's the story with /tr/ deployment? anything i should do to help? any markup errors i need to fix or anything?

69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:49): that will be quite a lot of work
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:49): probably not worth doing for this snapshot

e3fb62ebfa4f36acf5cbff6a6ed0f2e0 (00:54): 8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68, a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2, 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e, it can be replaced with http://www.w3.org/TR/2008/WD-XMLHttpRequest2-20080930/#document-pointer
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (00:54): Title: XMLHttpRequest Level 2 (at www.w3.org)
e3fb62ebfa4f36acf5cbff6a6ed0f2e0 (00:54): which is not very useful admittedly
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:55): k, done
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:55): regenning now
